name: Entangled: Schrödinger's cat and Heisenberg's dog
name_original: Entangled: Schrödinger's cat and Heisenberg's dog
description:
Schrödinger's cat and Heisenberg's dog have messed with the wrong yarn and gotten themselves entangled. To untangle them, you must recreate various patterns while their movements are entangled with each other.

This is a game created in a weekend for the Quantum Game Jam 2022.
